titles.title: A resolution recognizing the artistic and cultural contributions of the Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater and the 50th Anniversary of the first performance of Alvin Ailey's masterwork, "Revelations".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 2/17/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. Honors the Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater as it celebrates the 50th anniversary of the dance work "Revelations."
